website_summaries.verdict: Curved handles let you carry this basket to and from the grill with ease. Just be sure to use mitts to protect your hands from the heat.
pros: Eraser-sized holes allow smoke to pass without food escaping
Coat with olive oil before each use to keep food from sticking
Works well for vegetables and fish
cons: Large enough to prevent some smaller grills from closing, so measure carefully

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill basket
customer_reviews.text: It's so great to not have to create a little tin foil box that gets thrown away after every time I grill. I love that the veggies get better access to the grill smoke and heat in this. It's really sturdy and durable feeling. I always buy products based on reviews, so if my review was helpful to you, please let me know, as I try to pay it forward!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel J

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Large Enough for family gatherings, and Deep enough to turn veggies without spilling over!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! I have been grilling a basket of veggies every weekend since my purchase. I can put a head of broccoli, cauliflower, two zucchinis, two yellow squash, one red bell pepper and 1/2 an onion in this basket! It is deep enough so I can turn the veggies easily without them spilling out (used to have a grill 'tray' - worthless). I would highly recommend this to any one of my dear friends or family and purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Downey Family

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $20
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to write a product review right away like the seller was begging me to by bombarding my email. I have used this basket several times now for veggies for fajitas, grilled squash etc. it works very well. Flip it over and cook salmon or halibut fillets. It has held up very well, easy clean up. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: phxn12

customer_reviews.title: More veggies!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these since I got my grill. I like to grill and I don't see the point in steaming a veggie if I'm gonna be grilling. Plus, it's just added clean up. I hate haveing single purpose items in the kitchen but this is worth it. I used it the day after it was delivered and I'm glad I got it. I cooked asparagus and only had a couple of the thinnest ones slip through the holes. This also helps get even cooking of the veggies as the basket can be rotated around rather than moving the veggies around the grill.
customer_reviews.author: FR in VA

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: works fine but i just wish the edges were a little less sharp. you could cut yourself while cleaning or handling this. this one is better than others i've had that went directly in trash after it cut my finger while cleaning them. i recommend this item and that you use caution around the sharp edges of metal grill baskets in general.
customer_reviews.author: lcfshs

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality grill basket! Usually my husband and I use ours to grill veggies, including peppers and onions with lots of seasonings. This grill basket is large enough to fit more than enough food for two people, but is also easy enough to maneuver on and off the grill. It's easy to clean and cools off pretty quickly. It's the only grill basket we've tried since it's so great!
customer_reviews.author: little mittens

customer_reviews.title: Nice Vegetable Grill
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product and I would buy it again. It's sturdy, holds a nice amount of vegetables, and fits nicely with grilling, or camping, which we will use it a lot when camping.
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: Good grill basket easy clean
customer_reviews.text: The only bad thing about this is I wish there was more space on the bottom. If there was as much space as there is at top I would really be in love purchasing another. Does a good job must stir alot. I love grilling veggies might look for one with a bigger diameter. It is very well crafted and customer service reached out to make sure it arrived safely.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fox-Laskowiecki

customer_reviews.title: Pantheon of New Outdoor Recipes
customer_reviews.text: This basket is well made, sturdy, does what I want it to do; cook vegetables outdoors in ways that would set off smoke detectors in the kitchen. The easy to clean rating is low. This is no shortcoming of the basket itself. It doesn't matter. Olive oil at these temperatures sticks to everything and I use a lot. Crushed mini red potatoes w/rosemary & garlic to die for! Next it's blackened brussel sprouts. No non-stick surface to get messed up. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: superjeff

customer_reviews.title: My Girlfriend had a basket like this and I feel in love
customer_reviews.text: While the product is the right size & everything looks lovely, it is very flimsy and the finish even when sprayed everything sticks & it is horible to clean. My Girlfriend had a basket like this and I feel in love. Different brand, much heavier and things didn't glue to it. Also when I grill veggies in this manner I have tossed them in a bag with olive oil and spices to help reduce the problem. All in all very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Poore

customer_reviews.title: I should have taken the other reviews more seriously
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken the other reviews more seriously. While it has an attractive price, and looks sound, this is a cheaply produced basket, probably thrown together by the thousands. Not even fully attached at corners, I doubt this would last through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good grill basket
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a chance to use this grill basket and was surprised that it had plenty of room for all my veggies. Mine came intact so no issues with broken tabs. My new grill is a "portable" table grill so I was worried the grill lid wouldn't close over the basket, but it just made it! The basket is good quality steel, and easy to clean. I was also worried about the reviews that said the corners were sharp, but found that you just have to know this and be careful when cleaning it. I am super happy with this purchase! Will be grilling a LOT more now.
customer_reviews.author: percenturynine

customer_reviews.title: Necessary grill item!
customer_reviews.text: If you are cooking stuffed jalapenos, or bacon-wrapped shrimp, or even grilled veggies, this basket is for you. Never lose an item through the grill again! Also, you won't have it sticking to the grill and be unable to get it lose! Lol, the number of bacon wrapped jalapenos I've mutilated with a spatula trying to get them off the grill. This basket is sturdy, easy to clean and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: KSev 83

customer_reviews.title: Gifted to a "griller"
customer_reviews.text: In fact, the recently purchased grill basket is my 3rd. I own and use 2. The recent purchase is a gift to my grill-master son in law. He thoroughly enjoyed the grilled veggies I prepared, and was impressed by the ease of use and cleaning of the basket. I made the decision immediately to gift a grill basket to him. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ben jr. On my new

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Tasty Veggies on the BBQ
customer_reviews.text: The basket is sturdy, and works fine. I would recommend it for doing its job, grilling food well. However, my basket arrived with one corner with a rivet off. The metal is strong and stays rigid without the rivet, so it still works, but I'm a bit disappointed that it was not checked before sending, or it was handled roughly. It doesn't appear to be otherwise damaged, so I think it was on oversight on quality control? I still like and use the design.
customer_reviews.author: petunia

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy stainless steel basket that works great for any type of grilling. Instead of putting all my vegetables on skewers for kabobs I just threw them all in this basket and it worked beautifully! Clean up was pretty easy too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to use, just was a little slower grilling compared to regular.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my dad as one of his birthday gifts. I was surprised at how big it actually was, to see it in person just gave me a different perspective than reading about it. It came well packaged with no damage. My dad liked it a lot, his only complaint was that it was a little slow, so he had to adjust that with the other things he was grilling. It grilled everything perfectly it was just slow. That’s the only reason I gave it 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape.  Just remember to coat it with oil!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and shape of this pan and the grilling was fantastic. We didn't use enough oil, though, and completely destroyed it after one use. I contacted the seller to ask them to highlight the need to use a coating and they offered a code to order a new basket for free! Excellent customer service. Will coat the new basket and let's see how it works out.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping, easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a last minute camping trip and it worked perfectly. We used this for vegetables, hotdogs, cinnamon rolls, etc. we just balanced the handles on a few rocks and had the perfect makeshift grill. Definitely great to keep with our camping supplies, especially since we never know what the fire pit situation is going to be when we show up. Very easy clean up too, quick wipe down while it was still warm and it was good as new.
customer_reviews.author: francesca caputo

customer_reviews.title: nice product that seems well designed and constructed
customer_reviews.text: I got this basket to grill vegetables in my Green Egg without the fuss of vegetables falling through the grill. It works well, but my advice is to spray some cooking oil on it first so the vegetables will not stick. It did clean up fairly easily and the basket was big enough to make a fairly large portion, just keep tossing the vegetables so they get cooked evenly. So far I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grill basket
customer_reviews.text: The basket makes cooking on the grill so easy. We used it to grill different vegetables as well as sea scallops already and the food not only looks yummy but tastes good. It was easy to turn to food around to achieve perfect cooking. On top of this, the basket is easy to clean with dish detergent and a sponge. Will try next for pizzas!
customer_reviews.author: NYmom

customer_reviews.title: Our basket did not have the problem the basket was having. our corners were attached good.
customer_reviews.text: We used this basket to grill on our outdoor grill various vegetables. It helps by not burning the veggies before there fully cooked. It is heavy duty and should last a long time. We have a gas stove and we can also grill on the top of the stove. Just a good design and build. We would recommend this to anyone !
customer_reviews.author: jdhusker

customer_reviews.title: Veggies taste awful when used on the grill.
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely hard to clean back to its original look. Virtually impossible. It does work well for cooking veggies on the grill, but the veggies do not taste good at all when using this. I mean they taste bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Angled walls are a very clever design feature!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely works just as described. A little bummed out that it discolored after the first use, but it has not effected its performance one bit. Most pleased with the amount it holds, given the angled walls. Allows for grill marks on all veggies, not just the ones on the bottom. I grill veggies at least 2-3 times per week so this is a lifesaver! I looked at many other grill baskets and am very happy I made this selection!
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Grilling veggies  to perfection with this
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for well over a year and it's just great, it has held up just fine. It's makes grilling veggies on the grill so much easier . We purchased one for each one of daughters. Quality product here.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Does Everything It's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to use, easy to clean, perfect for low maintenance veggie grilling. I wasn't sure what to expect when ordering this, but the metal is very strong cleans like a dream and we have delicious veggies that are basically fool proof to make.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica and Antony

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding a pork shoulder in a smoker box over an open pit!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this to smoke a pork shoulder over an open pit and it worked quite well! Hes pretty handy and made his own smoker box and used this to hold the pork. He was very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great basket, easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket. I’ve been using it on a Big Green Egg with Weber high temp non-stick spray with great results. With a little bar keepers friend cleanup is a breeze. The holes are a good size so veggies don’t fall through. I like the stainless finish.
customer_reviews.author: jle23

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill basket
customer_reviews.text: We use our grill basket to cook vegetables. We line the basket with foil before putting in the veggies, then we season the them and cover with foil so they steam cook. Before serving we sprinkle the veggies with grated Parmasen cheese, yummlicious!
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions are smaller than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for its larger advertised size, compared to others. It is only 11.25 X 11.25 inches and it is taller than 2 inches, which si advertised as exact...
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size Grilling Pan
customer_reviews.text: This grilling basket is perfect for shrimp, veggies including small corn on the cob, and has the durability that I have been looking for in my efforts to grill smaller items. I look forward to many years of not having to "fish" shrimp out of the grill pan, getting evenly cooked veggies, and trying new items as I get familiar with the grill basket.
customer_reviews.author: TMAN

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product because it holds a ton
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product because it holds a ton, and the shape of it makes it easy to stir without losing pieces to the fire. I've used it several times already, always for grilling veggies. It's wonderful to be able to have the awesome smoky grilled taste but the convenience of a stovetop pan. Cleans up easily, too. I just throw it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: LA Bookie

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill basket
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this addition to my grill accessories. I have tried the kind that are 2 sided baskets that are clipped together and did not like them. I have more control with the basket. I like being able to stir the veggies on the grill. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: muddy paws

customer_reviews.title: Darn-Goody-OK
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller basket. This 1 barely fits my grill when the lid is down. It is just as advertised -- no complaints atall! Now -- I gotta figger out how to handle the durn thing when it's hot. Live & learn -- or live & dont learn. Im a-working on it.
customer_reviews.author: 85607Scotty

customer_reviews.title: a very useful product
customer_reviews.text: After too many years of cooking veggies right on the grill surface like an idiot and watching hapless veggies fall into the depths of hell, I discovered that grill baskets exist. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill basket! It seems to be made very well and I think it'll last for a long time. Great size for throwing your vegetables in on the grill and the holes are small enough that you won't have to worry about the smallest veggies falling out. I gave this as a gift to my husband who loves grilling and it was a hit! I would highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Burge

customer_reviews.title: Poor tack welds make this Grill Basket unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: The basket has four small pieces of metal on the underside of each corner that are very poorly tack welded on. After opening the shipping box I noticed that one of the metal corner support tabs had broken a weld. I returned the grill basket for a full refund and decided to buy a better quality grill basket.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Tinley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I grill vegetables up to the brim with this every week. Hasn’t failed me yet. I could probably do a better job turning them to get a more even grill.
customer_reviews.author: E. Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: More sturdy than the Weber basket, but edges are sharp. Ended up returning because Aldi's had a porcelain enamled basket the same size for $7 with smooth edges. If I didn't find the Aldi's basket I would have kept this one and rounded the edges with a file.
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning is not easy. I guess I just have to get used to it not looking clean after using because the oil for seasoning discolored it.
customer_reviews.author: Bmarch

customer_reviews.title: Grill things that would ordinarily fall though grill grates.
customer_reviews.text: It's great for grilling items that may fall through the gas grill grates. Such as asperagus and other small skinny vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Jean D Lange

customer_reviews.title: So Great, I Bought Another
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these about two years ago, and I love it. I bought one for a friend and she loves it. I got a bigger grill, so a bought another one of these so I can do multiple sides at once.
customer_reviews.author: Impchucker

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I've grilled on the BBQ with this four times and every batch was perfect. I spray it with Pam before adding prepared veggies. To prepare veggies I cut zucchini & yellow squash in half length-wise then cross-wise in 3/8" slices; quarter a few mushrooms, quarter 1/2 sweet onion and separate layers; three asparagus cut into 1" pieces; put all in food-bag with 2 Tbs EVOO and a few spices; and toss. In a 400 degree grill it's table ready after 15-18 minutes of frequent tossing/mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Tampabuc

customer_reviews.title: Solid product - Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as pictured. Product is solid, thick-gauge metal. Corners are re-enforced. Grilling surface is large enough to accommodate several cut up vegetables such as squash, zucchini, etc.
customer_reviews.author: cpy

customer_reviews.title: Wish the shape was different
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping I’d love this grill vegetable basket. Based on the shape of the basket the vegetables did not cook thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Asendio | @amazonstolemywallet

customer_reviews.title: Best Vegetable Grill Basket!
customer_reviews.text: This grill basket makes grilling vegetables a snap! Easy to use and clean-up and makes the best grilled vegetables. We are eating more veggies as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy P

customer_reviews.title: Grill Basket works great
customer_reviews.text: I liked the 1st one so well I bought a 2nd one. I use it on my pellet smoker/grill for smoking items that might otherwise fall through the grates or need to be contained from the grill mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Delicious if done right
customer_reviews.text: Great for making kabobs without the stick. Delicious flavors all together on the grill. Hungry just thinking about it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size holes for grilling veggies
customer_reviews.text: I've had grill baskets in the past and had issues with the wholes being too big (veggies fell through) or too small (didn't get any grill marks). This one is the perfect compromise! I also like that the sides are high enough that you can stir the veggies around without losing any out of the side while grilling.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.........
customer_reviews.text: This is solid and a good grade of material. Nothing fancy, just something to grill selected veggies and similar items in. Makes a nice "colander" as well. Product just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the size
customer_reviews.text: OK construction - as hard to clean as most. Be sure to measure your grill carefully before ordering - this unit is large enough to block the use of some covers.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use grill basket that's held up well over the past few months grilling at various temperatures and foods. Would highly recommend. Found it easier to use than skewers as well as more environmentally friendly than traditional wood skewers.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Best way to cook veggies
customer_reviews.text: Best thing that I have found to cook and carry brussels sprouts to and from the BBQ grill.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our grilling
customer_reviews.text: Works great to grill vegetables easily and easy to clean. Not just burgers on our grill anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome veggies!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Paid full price for this basket and would do it again! We used this over the 4th of July for a cookout we had for family and friends. Everyone commented on how wonderful the grilled veggies tasted. I'm not even much of a grilled vegetable fan, but even I thought the were fantastic. I would highly recommend the Grillux basket!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the Grillux basket
customer_reviews.text: Love the Grillux basket! The first time we used it to grill shrimp, which turned out excellent. Many, many things to use in the basket, will enjoy it for years to come. The quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: mitzi

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling baskets
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these baskets and have used one of them twice. For grilling peppers and onions and again for potatoes. They work very well and are so easy to clean up. Just put them in my sink with a little soap and water and they come out like new. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Moire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cleans easily. Little big for my small grill but overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Stainless
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this basket to replace an old non-stick version. We used this several times on a recent camping trip and were very pleased. High quality stainless steel basket!
customer_reviews.author: Ebeth

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill pan. Great size for large portions or also good if you want to grill a small amount of vegetables. Works great for grilling shrimp, scallops or tuna steaks. Easy to clean. Sturdy, well made and safe, non-toxic metal.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Grills vegetables beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: We only grill vegetables and this works great; it does discolor. I suppose if you want to keep it looking new you would have to scrub it with SOS after each use. We don't mind the clean-but-seasoned look. Dishwasher removes food but not stain.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Whinnery

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the grill basket and is thrilled he doesn’t have to use skewers anymore. Daughter and I love it because we get grilled veggies more often now without grumbling. :) Cleans up easily and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C Haaker

customer_reviews.title: Broken Tab But Still a Good Grill Basket
customer_reviews.text: Dear Mr. Kang, I liked your grill basket because it is much bigger than others I have seen. I did have damage on one tab that was broken. I appreciate your offer to send a new one. That would be very kind of you.
customer_reviews.author: MGH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Had another similar grill, but it wasn't stainless steel, so it rusted. This is perfect ... light weight, easy to clean, just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: CA2TX

customer_reviews.title: grill basket
customer_reviews.text: Works great for roasting veggies on the grill. Con: I wasn't expecting it to warp and distort when heated on the grill
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED MY FIRST GRILL BASKET SO MUCH I ORDERED ANOTHER ONE. IT WORKS GREAT ON MY CHARCOAL GRILL. AS A MATTER OF FACT I JUST USED BOTH OF THEM TONIGHT. IT WAS A GREAT PURCHASE. I JUST SPRAY IT WITH PAM COOKING SPRAY AND IT IS FAIRLY EASY TO CLEAN.
customer_reviews.author: V L ALLEY

customer_reviews.title: The grill basket works as expected and I am pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The grill basket works as expected and I am pleased with my purchase. It's a great size to serve grilled veggies to a crowd. I was able to fit quite a bit in the basket and got great grill marks and flavor on the veggies. It fit perfectly on my 5-burner propane grill, leaving enough room on the grill to fit some steaks. It seems sturdy and was easy to clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: Works great no worries about heat.
customer_reviews.text: Stainless is the way to go. No worries of overheating and losing non stick.
customer_reviews.author: psychone

customer_reviews.title: Such a great grill pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill pan. We use it for grilling veggies and it holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: AL819

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for vegetables and shrimp - that was purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: Well built - would like the individual handles to be a little bigger - if you pick it up with both hands it is perfect, if you use one hand a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs one for efficient cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, nice weight, easy clean, works perfect and allows you to make great side dishes
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: This is great for grilling vegetables
customer_reviews.text: This is great for grilling vegetables. We used cherry tomatoes and baby peppers and it was so much easier to grill vegetables in lieu of putting them directly on the grill. I would recommend this grill basket for your veggies and smaller grilling items!
customer_reviews.author: Noelani

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: It worked really good. I purchased it for camping and now we use it on our grill all the time. wroks really good
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: The flat surface makes it easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Does everything I was expecting. The larger holes allow lots of heat and char to come through. The flat surface makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for BBQing veggie without having them fall into the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Makes some yummy veggies!
customer_reviews.text: A little annoying to clean but we love cooking our veggies with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill Basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill basket—I marinate veggies in olive oil & granulated garlic powder and they are SO delicious!!!
customer_reviews.author: diane oberholzer

customer_reviews.title: My veggies are safe!
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my popup camper and use it to grill vegetables on campouts. I love that I get the tasty flavor of being cooked over a campfire without the worry of losing them in the fire, or watching them roll away on a grill grate.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dvorak

customer_reviews.title: easy to bend with a little cleaning pressure
customer_reviews.text: The looks and quality appear acceptable on first glance. Put some cutup veggies that were seasoned and oiled in the basket to BBQ. The veggies came out really tasty and yummy. Now, the task of cleaning the burnt-on veggies. Not the easiest to do considering the the steel is not too thick...easy to bend with a little cleaning pressure. But it mostly cleaned. Would have liked a thicker metal...maybe a different type of steel.
customer_reviews.author: Dwaine Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket! So far I've only used it for grilled veggies, and they were delicious- I plan to try some shrimp next. Anyone who grills needs one of these baskets. They're a great size, and the basket is very well made, easy to clean after use. Customer service is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: susan galasso

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This basket sits well on the grill and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Doglover08

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Love this veggie grill. My wife have started grilling vegetables and this piece works like a charm. Perfect size for the grill and most importantly...keeps all the vegetables inside the grill pan to prevent them from falling through the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling vegetables!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for grilling vegetables on the barbque pit. We simply wiped the inside of the basket with a small amount of olive oil, then filled with cauliflower, bell pepper, onion, and broccoli. Very easy, and the vegetables had a great taste. I wash it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing basket
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered several of these for our home use and camper use. Now we are ordering for Christmas. Love this basket, vegetables never tasted so good. Customer service is amazing, ships immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No spills
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a grill basket that was deep enough to cook quite a few items without spilling over. This fit the bill perfectly. It is also easy to clean and easy to store. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G

customer_reviews.title: Just a messy hassle
customer_reviews.text: We have used this about 4 times and have tried a variety of veggies and meats. It just does a bad job at everything. Horrible to clean, even cooking results, bulky size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my barbecue accessories, Grillux performed flawlessly. Vegetables cooked evenly. A must for every griller, such a huge step up over aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: dcroybal

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a a Christmas present for a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a a Christmas present for a relative on my mother's side of the family. Knowing what she likes to put onto the grill & how much stuff she brings out along with what is going onto the grill I think it would be very helpful especially when it comes to peppers or shich-go-bobs ( or however that is spelled). It may even reduce trips when going in & out of the house & to & from the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grill basket
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Exactly as pictured. Now I can easily grill veggies on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: AllisonWonderland

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!!
customer_reviews.text: After having seen our friend use a grill basket recently, we had to have one too. We chose this model after reading reviews for many different products. We are quite happy with it. It's big enough to hold a lot of vegetables or ears of corn or long asparagus. The seller is very friendly and attentive , offering to exchange it if we were unhappy with our purchase in any way-- which we aren't.
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: The Grillux was so easy to clean and the size was great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an existing basket that had a black coating, was so difficult to clean. The Grillux was so easy to clean and the size was great. Very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but just one complaint
customer_reviews.text: We are thoroughly enjoying this basket. Grills veggies faster than expected. Wish we had bought one years ago. I'd rate it a 5 if it were not for the razor sharp edges on the handles. I cut my finger while washing the basket. Easily corrected with a bit of sanding/filing.
customer_reviews.author: BuBoy

customer_reviews.title: Love using this
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use and clean. The size is great too, we can fit a lot on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer LaMontagne

customer_reviews.title: Great basket!
customer_reviews.text: This grill basket is great! Made well and sturdy. I’m a fan!
customer_reviews.author: MommaLovesReviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling veggies!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very glad I purchased this for grilling veggies. No more veggies falling off a skewer and I can fit a lot of veggies in it to boot! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Grilling Veggies!
customer_reviews.text: Great for grilling a bunch of different veggies at the same time in one place. Just chop some veggies, toss them on, sprinkle a little salt and pepper and viola!
customer_reviews.author: PrinnyNY

customer_reviews.title: I bought one and was so impressed that I got ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and was so impressed that I got two more. They really open the possibilities of out door cooking. A must have in my book.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Long

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product - No Issues
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great with the basket - no defects of issues. I used it to grill summer seasonal vegetables and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Carl M. Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Makes grilling veggies VERY easy
customer_reviews.text: This basket has helped me up my grilled vegetable game. Much easier to toss/stir in the basket than worrying about dropping piece through the grill grate. Also allows for things like grilled broccoli and brussel sprouts. Have only used a few times so far, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for vegetables - no falling into the grate.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

product_meta.title: #1 BEST Vegetable Grill Basket - BBQ Accessories for Grilling Veggies, Fish, Meat, Kabob, or Pizza - Use as Wok, Pan, or Smoker - Quality Stainless Steel - Camping Cookware - Charcoal or Gas Grills OK
product_meta.description:
Item Package Quantity:1#1 Rated Grill Basket. Rated 4.7 out of 5 Stars on Amazon by Real Customers.

+ Perfect Gift for Any Grilling Enthusiast
+ Great for Veggies, Mushrooms, Peppers, Shrimp and Much more...
+ Fits Most Gas or Charcoal Grills from Weber, Charbroil, Brinkmann and more...
+ Made w/ High Quality 430 Grade Stainless Steel
+ Looks Great and Will Last Many Years!

Never Lose Your Food Again!

This Stainless Steel Grill Basket by GRILLUX is a must have accessory if you like grilling your veggies.
Grilled veggies are delicious, however it's hard to enjoy when it gets eaten up by the grill, instead of you.

The GRILLUX Grill Basket makes cooking small food super easy!

Specs:
- Measures 13"L x 12"W x 2.25"H. Fits just about any grill
- Made with High Quality 430 Grade Stainless Steel. Retains heat and cooks food fast
- Raised edges and curved handles keeps everything inside. Toss and stir fry your food right on the grill
- Small pencil eraser sized holes allows smoke to pass through for great smoky bbq flavor

How to use:
1. To prevent food from sticking, coat the grill with oil (Olive Oil, Canola Oil, PAM, or any other cooking oil)
2. Cut and Toss your food in olive oil and season to your liking
3. Preheat the basket on the grill for 1-2 minutes
4. When ready, throw in your food!
5. CAUTION: Grill Basket will get VERY HOT. Make sure to handle it with a heat resistant glove

Cleaning Tips:
- Clean with soap and warm water or use your dishwasher
- If food gets stuck use steel wool or an abrasive pad
- Stainless steel will naturally discolor. Use Bar Keeper's Friend to keep it looking new

The GRILLUX Grill Basket comes with a LIFETIME GUARANTEE, so if you're not happy with it, let us know and we'll take care of you.

Get your GRILLUX Grill Basket Today! Order Now.
feature_bullets: BEST GRILL ACCESSORY for barbecuing small foods like onions, peppers, mushrooms and shrimp
EASY to USE - Curved handles allows for easy carrying. Use as Wok pan to stir fry chopped chicken, beef or pork. Nothing beats great smoky BBQ flavor.
KEEPS FOOD INSIDE - Raised edges prevents food from escaping. Perfectly sized grill holes (a little bigger than a pencil eraser) allows heat and smoke to pass through without letting food run away.
HEAVY DUTY COOKWARE - 100% Stainless steel. Retain heat and cooks food fast. Great for Camping!
FITS MOST GRILLS (All Weber, Charbroil, Gas and Charcoal Grills) - Measures Exactly 13"L x 12"W x 2
